publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2056.3 Frances Curran: Supermarkets and the Scottish Food Chain—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2056) in the name of Shiona Baird, leave out from "notes the Office of Fair Trading’s report" to end and insert "calls on the Scottish Executive to integrate economic, social, health and environmental policies into food policy with the emphasis on local food and to ensure that food policy implementation is both environmentally-friendly and socially-equitable, and further calls on the Executive to ensure that more local organic suppliers provide locally grown high nutritional value foods for school meals."
